pageContext.description: Either blade wing has a swollen centre line with bevel outside; midrib asymmetrical on face, more-or-less symm. on reverse; triangular facet at tang/blade junction rounded - original or modern rubbing? Hammer ripple marks or faces of tang, and sides; tang twisted with respect to blade;
pageContext.surface: Dull gold mainly, merging to dark brown for lower part of tang; odd pits (small) dark brown and one or two with green corrosion productions. None of damage to edges is obviously modern, file-marks round tang, rounding corners, may be modern.
pageContext.toSearch: Arreton, Newport, Isle Of Wight Po30, UK
